resources.string: \"Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while Allah has not yet made evident those of you who fight in His cause and made evident those who are steadfast?\"
Avoid fitnah by locking your device for 10 minutes
(Incoming phone call can still be received)
May Allah grant us all steadfastness
Please enable device admin setting on the next screen in order to allow the application to lock your device
Should we lock your device now?
Your device will automatically be locked when you open the application next time. May Allah grant us all steadfastness. Ameen.
